attributes.action: Give Tony Foulds a mention in the New Year Honours for his selfless dedication
attributes.background: Tony Foulds is a humble man who at 11 yrs old witnessed the U.S. Bomber crash into a park in Sheffield. For over 60 years he has looked after the memorial and kept alive the memory of the 10 men who lost their lives, without any prompting and without seeking any recognition.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
